dict.acceptation: 时期；（一段）时间；学时；句号；
具有某个时代特征的；（关于）过去某一特定历史时期的；（家具、服饰、建筑等）某一时代的；

sent.orig: In England they call a period a stop.
Period and Payback Period of Investment of Project: 2 period and 6-year payback period of investment.
sent.trans: 项目建设期及投资回报期：建设期两年，静态投资回收期6年。

sent.orig: Period and Payback Period of Investment of Project: 1-year ofperiod and 4-year payback period of investment.
sent.trans: 项目建设期及投资回报期：建设期一年，静态投资回收期4年。

sent.orig: Business affairs of mobile 2009 electron will by the concept period, platform period strides applied period.
sent.trans: 2009年移动电子商务将由概念期、平台期迈入应用期。

sent.orig: Policy fatigue, long dormant period, short period of awakening, technical peak period.
sent.trans: 政策疲劳期、多头休眠期、空头苏醒期、技术见顶期。
